actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to limit the export of certain nuclear technology and materials so as to prevent the proliferation of nuclear weapons.

summary.text: Stipulates that the Nuclear Regulatory Commission shall not license or otherwise authorize for export and the Energy Research and Development Administration shall not engage in or allow any export, of nuclear fuel or nuclear technology to any country that is not a party to the nuclear nonproliferation treaty and which develops either any enrichment or reprocessing plant without concluding an agreement with the International Atomic Energy Agency or Euratom by which all present and future nuclear facilities are made subject to safeguards established by either such agency against diversion of nuclear material, and which furnishes or agrees to furnish uranium enrichment or nuclear fuel reprocessing plants to a country not a party to the nuclear nonproliferation treaty.

titles.title: A bill to limit the export of certain nuclear technology and materials so as to prevent the proliferation of nuclear weapons.
